text: The 2015 ACB Playoffs will be the final phase of the 2014–15 ACB season. They will start on May 28 and will end on June. FC Barcelona is the defending champions. All times are CEST (UTC+02:00), except the game played in the Canary Islands (WEST, UTC+01:00). ==Bracket== ==Quarterfinals== ===Real Madrid v Herbalife Gran Canaria=== ===FC Barcelona v FIATC Joventut=== ===Unicaja v Laboral Kutxa Baskonia=== ===Dominion Bilbao Basket v Valencia Basket=== ==Semifinals== ===Real Madrid v Valencia Basket=== ===FC Barcelona v Unicaja=== ==Finals== ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Liga ACB playoffs Playoffs
title: 2015 ACB Playoffs
